thread.section_title: LIC Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Go there!
thread.title_full: Go there! - Review of LIC Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jan R
title: Go there!
text:
This new hotel is only 1 metrostop from Lexington Ave. on Manhattan.
It is like a good motel, as you can find them out in the U.S.--- just this in New York.
Like in a lot of motels you will get a free breakfast.
If they offered yoghurt it would be super. As it is it is OK!
Reception is very good!
It is so close to the metro from JFK and to Manhattan.
Nearby street with a lot of restaurants.
Room Tip: Do NOT accept a room at 1 floor. The chef will wake you up, when he use the ice maker every day at 0... See more room tips
